name: Frog Forest
description:
WARNING: This game contains blood, death, light body horror, brainwashing, inadvertent cannibalism, suicide, and swearing. There is nothing visually graphic about any of these depictions, but they are story elements in this game, so be advised.

________________________________________________________________________________

Once upon a time, a Knight fell in love with a Mage. One day the Mage went to investigate rumors of disappearances in a forest that was home to a wicked witch and never returned. Now the Knight has gone to the forest find his love, and uncover the truth behind the disappearances, but will he make it out or fall victim as well?

Developer's note: This game was meant to be a short game for Mini-Jam 106, but I ended up getting ideas for a full game from this so this functions kind of like a demo rather than something with a definitive ending.

If you enjoyed it, please leave a comment! If you didn't enjoy it, please leave a comment! I'd really love feedback and people gushing about the parts they liked or didn't like as the case may be.

The music used is in the public domain. I did not compose it myself.
